plot outline: Set against the backdrop of a vast, unique and unforgiving landscape, Gold is a taut thriller about greed and the lengths people will go to secure themselves a fortune. When two drifters travelling through the desert stumble across the biggest gold nugget ever found, the dream of immense wealth and greed takes hold. They hatch a plan to protect and excavate their bounty with one man leaving to secure the necessary equipment. The other man remains and must endure the harsh desert climate, preying wolves and intruders, whilst battling the creeping doubt that he has been abandoned to his own fate.
title: Gold
plot: When two men discover the biggest gold nugget ever found they must find a way to excavate it.

Set against the backdrop of a vast, unique and unforgiving landscape, _Gold_ (qv) is a taut thriller about greed and the lengths people will go to secure themselves a fortune. When two drifters travelling through the desert stumble across the biggest gold nugget ever found, the dream of immense wealth and greed takes hold. They hatch a plan to protect and excavate their bounty with one man leaving to secure the necessary equipment. The other man remains and must endure the harsh desert climate, preying wolves and intruders, whilst battling the creeping doubt that he has been abandoned to his own fate.::Official _Synopsis_ (qv)

When two drifters are travelling through the South Australian desert, they stumble across the biggest gold nugget ever found. The dream of enormous wealth and greed takes hold. They hatch a plan to protect and excavate their bounty with one man leaving (Keith aka Man #2) to secure the necessary equipment to pull it out of the earth. The other man (Virgil aka Man #1), remains on the spot and must suffer the harsh desert elements, preying wild dogs and mysterious intruders, whilst fighting the tumbling suspicion that he has been abandoned to his own fate.::Frank Liesenborgs <frank.liesenborgs@gmail.com>
